data.title: Indian Marketing Awards & India Brand Conclave celebrate the best performers in marketing
data.description: The fifth edition of the exchange4media Indian Marketing Awards was held at Leela Ambience, Gurugram. The awards recognise the fact that marketing is critical for the organic growth of a business. The biggest award - Marketing Team of the Year at IMA - was bagged by Zee TV. The awards were preceded by the India Brand Conclave 2018, themed ‘Driving Business Growth through Marketing Effectiveness’, wherein industry veterans shared their game-changing branding and marketing stories.

data.title: Realty Plus organises its 10th  conclave & excellence Awards- south 2018 Bangalore
data.description: The 10th edition of exchange4media’s Realty Plus Conclave & Excellence Awards-South 2018 held in Bangalore, saw the congregation of about 200 delegates comprising top builders, developers, realtors, architects and designers, planners and entrepreneurs in the realty space. The event commenced with a conclave based on the theme ‘Indian Realty: Stealing the Spotlight’.

data.title: Eminent jury assembles to pick   winners for exchange4media’s India pr & corporate communications Awards
data.description:
Distinguished media and marketing personalities assembled at a jury meet in Delhi to pick deserving winners from PR consultancies and Corporate Communications for exchange4media’s India PR & Corporate Communications Awards 2018, which will felicitate winners who have contributed towards the success of the PR industry. 
 The India PR and Corporate Communications Awards 
 will be held on December 13 in Gurugram

data.title: BW Businessworld unveils BW education magazine at B-school excellence conclave
data.description: BW Businessworld held a B-School Excellence Conclave in Delhi, which saw professors from prestigious universities and industry professionals discuss challenges, innovations, the future of B-schools and how to bridge the gap from classrooms to cabin. The latest edition of the BW Education Magazine was also unveiled at the event by Satya Pal Singh, Minister of State for Human Resource Development & Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation

data.title: Forbes India leadership Awards recognize achievements of biz leaders and entrepreneurs
data.description: The eighth Forbes India Leadership Awards held in Mumbai recognized entrepreneurship, excellence, innovation and transformational leadership in India. The evening saw various companies and leaders awarded for their outstanding work, with two teenaged entrepreneurs taking centre-stage for their journey and contribution to the world of entrepreneurship.

full of Business Authors only. The evening saw some
of the renowned business tycoons’
and authors in attendance

data.title: Groupm, Mindshare, Lodestar um win big at Media Ace Awards 2018
data.description: The 4th edition of exchange4media’s Media ACE Awards held in Mumbai recognized Indian media agencies for their award-winning work and contribution to the industry. GroupM bagged the Media Network of The Year award, while LodestarUM and Mindshare India tied for the Agency of the Year title with Ashish Bhasin winning the Network Head of the Year award
